duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintaining fueling equipment, Point of Sale systems, and related equipment at convenience stores and service stations.

Performing installation, preventive maintenance, troubleshooting, and repair of fueling equipment, including dispensers, POS and controllers, tank monitors, USTs and related piping and controls, hydraulic systems, and sumps.
Obtaining and maintaining Verifone (VASC) certification (company will provide paid training).
Operating a company vehicle and providing shared call and coverage for after-hours emergencies (approximately one week per month).
Assisting with winter plowing and snow removal, renovation and construction projects, and performing initial assessments of issues with building and grounds.
Conducting monthly safety and preventive maintenance audits, and assisting outside tradespeople, contractors, and inspectors with accessing the building and providing necessary information.
Assisting with tank replacements and general renovations, and performing additional tasks as required.

education_certification.credential: Background in electrical, mechanical, and/or IT/retail point of sale is strongly preferred.
Additional construction and/or commercial building maintenance experience is helpful.
Valid driver's license and the ability to operate a work truck, hand tools, and machinery is required.
